title: Thermal Management Challenges in Medical Equipment - ATS Webinar Series

media:group.media:title: Thermal Management Challenges in Medical Equipment - ATS Webinar Series
media:group.media:description:
Thermal challenges in medical diagnostic equipment such as EKG machines, defibrillators, telemetry, ultrasound and other equipment present both similar challenges to other electronics as well as their own unique set of needs due to their importance in patients lives. This webinar will focus on the specific needs that medical diagnostic equipment requires.

https://www.qats.com
